mapper.select: SELECT MATERIALS_ID materialsId, MATERIALS_CLASSIFY materialsClassify, MATERIALS_NAME materialsName, MATERIALS_SPECIFICATION materialsSpecification, MATERIALS_SHORTENED materialsShortened, MATERIALS_DESCRIBE materialsDescribe, MATERIALS_IMG materialsImg, MATERIALS_TAGGING materialsTagging, MATERIALS_TYPE materialsType, MATERIALS_CONTRACT_RIGHTS materialsContractRights, MATERIALS_MATTER materialsMatter, MATERIALS_SHELF_LIFE materialsShelfLife, MATERIALS_HOURLY_BASIS materialsHourlyBasis, MATERIALS_TAX_RATE materialsTaxRate, MATERIALS_UNIT materialsUnit, PRODUCTION_UNIT productionUnit, MATERIALS_SUTTLE materialsSuttle, MATERIALS_ROUGH_WEIGHT materialsRoughWeight, MATERIALS_LONG materialsLong, MATERIALS_WIDE materialsWide, MATERIALS_TALL materialsTall, UNIT_LONG_WIDE_TALL unitLongWideTall, MATERIALS_CODING materialsCoding, MATERIALS_STATE materialsState, MATERIALS_CREATOR materialsCreator, MATERIALS_ABBREVIATION materialsAbbreviation, STANDARD_UNIT standardUnit, AUXILIARY_UNIT auxiliaryUnit, CREATE_DATE createDate, UPDATE_DATE updateDate FROM SMSCKE_MATERIALS WHERE 1=1
